comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: This photo is probably connected with the Bain Agency's 1914 coverage of the Pan-American Peace Conference at Niagara Falls, an assembly which was prompted by Mexican -- USA tensions, arising from the U. S. invasion of Vera Cruz.
